title: Riot account
body: Apparently "League of legend accounts are now riot accounts" and iv been prompted to choose a new username to sign in with, however the username which i want to change it to (which i have had since i transferred to OCE servers when they were first introduced from NA), furthermore my username is not taken on any other servers, so why doesnt it let me change my username to the one which i actually already have?

replies.body: It seems likely your PBE account shares a Username. To keep the UN attached to your OCE account you'll first have to change the UN of your PBE account by logging into that update page with it. If you can't remember your password, follow the password reset process through support (since you aren't getting the emails).

P.S this username is super unique no chance somebody else has it and i had a PBE account years ago but i cannot remember if it had the same USERNAME, however when i try to get the PBE account back nothing is sent to my email "shrug"
